intro.title: Construction Safety
intro.description: Ensure compliance with construction health and safety regulations using Salatiso OHS Tools. Our resources help you manage risks, meet legal requirements, and protect workers on site, leveraging best practices from *Safety First: The Essentials of OHS Plans*.
intro.download_link: Download the Construction OHS Plan: Click Here
legal_obligations.client.title: Client Obligations
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_a: Construction Regulation 5(1)(a): Prepare a Baseline Risk Assessment (BRA) identifying project hazards.
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_b: Construction Regulation 5(1)(b): Provide a Health & Safety Specification outlining project-specific requirements.
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_l: Construction Regulation 5(1)(l): Approve the Contractor’s Health & Safety Plan before work begins.
legal_obligations.contractor.title: Contractor Obligations
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_a: Construction Regulation 7(1)(a): Develop a Health & Safety Plan based on the Client’s specification.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_b: Construction Regulation 7(1)(b): Maintain a Health & Safety File on site with all required documents.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9: Construction Regulation 9: Conduct task-specific Hazard Identification and Risk Assessments (HIRAs).
legal_obligations.professional.title: H&S Professional Obligations
legal_obligations.professional.reg_5_5: Construction Regulation 5(5): Agents (PrCHSA) manage H&S on behalf of the Client, ensuring compliance.
legal_obligations.professional.reg_8_5: Construction Regulation 8(5): Officers (CHSO) assist Contractors in implementing and monitoring H&S systems.
legal_obligations.professional.sacpcmp: SACPCMP Guidelines: Must maintain registration and CPD requirements for professional roles.

sidebar.step_0.title: 📜 OHS Compliance
sidebar.step_0.description: Start by selecting a service to ensure compliance with the Occupational Health and Safety Act.
sidebar.step_0.fun_fact: ⚡ Fun Fact: Did you know proper OHS documentation can reduce workplace incidents by up to 30%? Let’s get started!
sidebar.step_1.title: 📋 Legislation
sidebar.step_1.description: Construction Regulation 5(1)(b) requires a Health & Safety Specification for all projects, while 7(1)(b) requires an H&S File.
sidebar.step_1.fun_fact: 🛡️ Fun Fact: A strong H&S Specification can reduce accidents by 30%! It’s like a safety shield for your project.
sidebar.step_2.title: 📋 Legislation
sidebar.step_2.description: Construction Regulation 5: Clients must provide a Health & Safety Specification and ensure contractors comply.
sidebar.step_2.fun_fact: 💼 Fun Fact: Clients who keep their COIDA registration up to date can avoid hefty fines—keep that number handy!
sidebar.step_3.title: 📜 Legislation
sidebar.step_3.description: Construction Regulation 7(1)(a): Contractors must develop a Health & Safety Plan based on the client’s specification.
sidebar.step_3.fun_fact: 🤝 Fun Fact: Appointing a contractor early can speed up compliance—teamwork makes the safety dream work!
sidebar.step_4.title: 📋 Legislation
sidebar.step_4.description: Construction Regulation 7(1)(b): Contractors must maintain a Health & Safety File on site with all required documents.
sidebar.step_4.fun_fact: 📞 Fun Fact: Having a contractor’s contact details ready can save the day in an emergency—stay connected!
sidebar.step_5.title: 📜 Legislation
sidebar.step_5.description: Construction Regulation 3(1): A permit is required for projects above R40,000 or lasting longer than 180 days.
sidebar.step_5.fun_fact: 🚧 Fun Fact: Clear site addresses help emergency services find you faster—don’t let a typo delay help!
sidebar.step_6.title: 📋 Legislation
sidebar.step_6.description: Construction Regulation 9: Task-specific Hazard Identification and Risk Assessments (HIRAs) are mandatory for all activities.
sidebar.step_6.fun_fact: 🔍 Fun Fact: Identifying high-risk activities early can reduce risks by 25%—it’s like giving your project a safety superpower!
sidebar.step_7.title: 📜 Legislation
sidebar.step_7.description: SACPCMP Guidelines: CHSOs and PrCHSAs must maintain registration and CPD requirements to ensure compliance.
sidebar.step_7.fun_fact: 🧑‍💼 Fun Fact: A registered SACPCMP pro can drastically reduce legal risks—your project’s safety MVP!
sidebar.step_8.title: 📋 Legislation
sidebar.step_8.description: Construction Regulation 5(1)(l): Clients must approve the contractor’s H&S Plan before work begins.
sidebar.step_8.fun_fact: 📝 Fun Fact: Clear accountability in documents can boost project transparency—everyone knows their role!
sidebar.step_9.title: 📜 Legislation
sidebar.step_9.description: Occupational Health and Safety Act: Proper documentation ensures compliance and protects all stakeholders.
sidebar.step_9.fun_fact: 🛒 Fun Fact: Your cart is your safety toolkit—every document you add makes your project safer!
